SELECT * FROM campproduct c JOIN campdetail cd ON c.camp_no = cd.camp_no JOIN camptype ct ON cd.camptype_no = ct.camptype_no JOIN campimg img ON c.camp_no = img.camp_no JOIN (SELECT min(cpi_no) no FROM campimg GROUP BY camp_no) imgno ON img.cpi_no = imgno.no WHERE ct.camptype_no = #{campTypeNo} ORDER BY c.camp_no DESC;
SELECT * FROM campproduct c join campimg img on c.camp_no = img.camp_no join (select min(cpi_no) no from campimg group by camp_no) imgno on img.cpi_no = imgno.no order by c.reg_date desc limit 6

SELECT * FROM campproduct c join campimg img on c.camp_no = img.camp_no join (select min(cpi_no) no from campimg group by camp_no) imgno on img.cpi_no = imgno.no join (select camp_no, count(*) c from reservation group by camp_no) r on c.camp_no = r.camp_no order by r.c desc limit 6

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM campproduct c JOIN campimg img ON c.camp_no = img.camp_no JOIN (SELECT min(cpi_no) no FROM campimg GROUP BY camp_no) imgno ON img.cpi_no = imgno.no WHERE c.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY c.camp_no DESC
SELECT * FROM campproduct c JOIN campimg img ON c.camp_no = img.camp_no JOIN (SELECT min(cpi_no) no FROM campimg GROUP BY camp_no) imgno ON img.cpi_no = imgno.no ORDER BY c.camp_no DESC

SELECT cd.cp_dt_no AS cpdtNo, cdi.cpdi_url AS cpdiUrl, ct.camptype_name AS campTypeName, cd.cp_dt_name AS cpdtName, cd.reg_date AS regDate, cd.upd_date AS updDate FROM campdetail AS cd JOIN campdetailimg AS cdi ON cd.cp_dt_no = cdi.cp_dt_no JOIN (SELECT min(cpdi_no) no FROM campdetailimg GROUP BY cp_dt_no) imgno ON cdi.cpdi_no = imgno.no JOIN camptype AS ct ON (cd.camptype_no = ct.camptype_no) WHERE cd.camp_no = #{campNo} ORDER BY cd.camp_no DESC

SELECT * FROM campproduct c JOIN campdetail cd ON c.camp_no = cd.camp_no JOIN camptype ct ON cd.camptype_no = ct.camptype_no JOIN campimg img ON c.camp_no = img.camp_no JOIN (SELECT min(cpi_no) no FROM campimg GROUP BY camp_no) imgno ON img.cpi_no = imgno.no WHERE c.camp_open BETWEEN #{campOpen} AND #{campClose} ORDER BY c.camp_no DESC;

SELECT * FROM reservation re JOIN campproduct c ON re.camp_no = c.camp_no JOIN campimg img ON c.camp_no = img.camp_no JOIN (SELECT min(cpi_no) no FROM campimg GROUP BY camp_no) imgno ON img.cpi_no = imgno.no JOIN campdetail cd ON re.cp_dt_no = cd.cp_dt_no JOIN `user` as u ON u.user_no = re.user_no WHERE re.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY re.reservation_no DESC;

SELECT * FROM reservation re JOIN campproduct c ON re.camp_no = c.camp_no JOIN campimg img ON c.camp_no = img.camp_no JOIN (SELECT min(cpi_no) no FROM campimg GROUP BY camp_no) imgno ON img.cpi_no = imgno.no JOIN campdetail cd ON c.camp_no = cd.camp_no JOIN `user` as u ON u.user_no = re.user_no WHERE re.user_no = 2 AND re.reservation_start > now() ORDER BY c.camp_no DESC;

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (camp_no, cp_dt_no, user_no, reservation_nop, reservation_start, reservation_end, reservation_date, camp_paymenttype) VALUES (#{campNo}, #{cpdtNo}, #{userNo}, #{reservationNop}, #{reservationStart}, #{reservationEnd}, #{reservationDate}, #{campPaymentType})
